argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isdrng.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | isdrng.u | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 3 |  | isdrng.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isdrng | |- ( R e. DivRing <-> ( R e. Ring /\ U = ( B \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprbi | |- ( R e. DivRing -> U = ( B \ { .0. } ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( X e. U <-> X e. ( B \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eldifsn | |- ( X e. ( B \ { .0. } ) <-> ( X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( X e. U <-> ( X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) ) ) |
